Title(s): The Harrowing of Hell; Hou ihesu crist herowede helle / Of harde gates ich will telle
Subjects: hell, harrowing of; legends, of Jesus and Mary
_description: The Harrowing of Hell, with versified title: ‘Hou ihesu crist herowede helle / Of harde gates ich will telle’ — 250 lines in couplets

BodDig86.First Lines:
Leue frend nou beþ stilleLesteþ þat ich tellen
                    wille…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…þat we moten comen þe toAnd hauen wiþ þe
                    rest and ro
BodDig86.Attributed Title:
Hou ihesu crist herowede helle of hardegates ich wille telle (f.
                    119)
